texts: Hello, world! Welcome to our AWS Translate application.
This is a sample translation request file.
You can include multiple text strings to be translated.
Each string in the 'texts' array will be translated separately.
The translation service supports over 75 languages.
Thank you for using our serverless translation service!
AWS Translate provides fast and accurate machine translation.
This application is built with React, AWS Lambda, and Amazon S3.
Upload this file to see how batch translation works.
The results will be saved to the response bucket automatically.
Your request will be saved in the Request S3 Bucket.
The translated results will appear in the Response S3 Bucket.
You can now see the translated text clearly displayed in the application.
The success rate and character count calculations are now working correctly.
Language selection has been improved with better visual design.
The authentication form now only requires email once during signup.

metadata.description: Enhanced sample translation request for AWS Translate application
metadata.created_by: AWS Translate Demo - Team Lambda Legends
notes: This is an enhanced sample file to demonstrate the improved translation functionality
You can modify the source_language, target_language, and texts fields
Supported language codes are available in the AWS Translate documentation
Each text string should be under 5000 bytes for optimal performance
Request data will be automatically saved to the Request S3 Bucket
Translation results will be saved to the Response S3 Bucket
Results are now displayed clearly in the application interface
testing_instructions: 1. Upload this file using the File Upload tab
2. Wait for the translation to complete
3. Check the 'Translated Text' section for clear results
4. Verify the statistics show correct counts and percentages
5. Confirm request was saved to Request S3 Bucket
6. Confirm response was saved to Response S3 Bucket
